results.brief_description: David Ferrier is a young farmer operating the family farm 25 km outside Birchip. In this short interview he talks about his relationship with the farm and the land and his unusual hobby of whip cracking.

results.title: Bobby and the Birchip Leisure Centre
results.creator_credit: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: The Birchip Leisure Centre is the social hub of Birchip township and surrounds. In addition to providing clubrooms for the local football, hockey, netball, golf and tennis clubs, the leisure centre also plays host to social events and functions. What is key to the centre is the fact that it is community built and funded - everyone in the local area collaborated to raise money and build the facilities. Here the manager, Bobby Liston, gives a personal view of this important place.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development
results.description: The Birchip Leisure Centre is the social hub of Birchip township and surrounds. In addition to providing clubrooms for the local football, hockey, netball, golf and tennis clubs, the leisure centre also plays host to social events and functions. What is key to the centre is the fact that it is community built and funded - everyone in the local area collaborated to raise money and build the facilities. Here the manager, Bobby Liston, gives a personal view of this important place.

In addition to providing clubrooms for the local football, hockey, netball, golf and tennis clubs, the leisure centre also plays host to social events and functions. Here the manager, Bobby Liston, gives a personal view of this important place.

results.creator_credit: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development

results.title: Birchip Historical Society
results.creator_credit: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: Containing a treasure trove of artefacts and memories, the Birchip Historical Society museum is maintained and staffed by hardworking volunteers from the area. Here Dorothy Reid, Harry Rickard and Ken Kemp talk about some memorable objects and the importance of the Historical Society to the community’s wellbeing.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development

results.title: The Birchip boy who became a legend
results.creator_credit: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development
results.brief_description: An intimate portrait of 84-year-old Roger Hogan, aka Australian Country music legend ‘Dusty Rankin’. Born and raised in Birchip, Dusty appeared on Australia’s Amateur Hour in 1946 and maintained an active career through to 1961 when he returned to working the farm full-time. He was one of the most popular country artists of the time, with many of his songs becoming popular standards. Here Roger remembers his rich life of touring but ultimately brings it all back home.
results.title_for_label: The Birchip boy who became a legend
results.creator_credit_for_label: Dean Lawry, David Meagher, Jason White, Astrid Scott and ACMI Content Development

He was one of the most popular country artists of the time, with many of his songs becoming popular standards. Here Roger remembers his rich life of touring but ultimately brings it all back home.

results.title: Peaches are a lustful fruit
results.brief_description: In 1960, when Domenic was 10, his father left Italy for Australia to work in Cobram. A year later Domenic followed with his mother and sisters. ” I never went to school in Australia so my voyage from Italy was the end of my childhood” Domenic’s story represents that of the many migrant workers who have helped build Australian agriculture. Created as part of the Racconti: La Voce del Popolo Digital Storytelling in association with The Italian Federation of Migrant Workers and their Families (FILEF).

results.title: Wise woman
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling and Hannan Kuea
results.brief_description: Hannan’s grandmother was a wise woman and a great storyteller who would tell Hannan ghost stories as a young girl in Sudan. This story was produced in association with the Craig Family Centre and funded by VicHealth.
